long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basket & Ball is an exciting basketball game available as a Chrome Extension. You can play this game for free on the website https://basketballlegends.net/. In "Basket & Ball," you will take control of a basketball and navigate it through various challenging levels. Your goal is to reach the hoop and score points while overcoming obstacles and using physics-based mechanics. With its intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, "Basket & Ball" offers a fun and engaging experience for basketball enthusiasts. So, get ready to bounce, roll, and shoot your way to victory in this entertaining Chrome Extension game!

*Note: We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://basketballlegends.net/
